channel.title: CVE Feed for Drupal -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Drupal -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-7602|2024-09-17T01:56:23.121Z -- drupal -- core
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists within multiple subsystems of Drupal 7.x and 8.x. This potentially allows attackers to exploit multiple attack vectors on a Drupal site, which could result in the site being compromised. This vulnerability is related to Drupal core - Highly critical - Remote Code Execution - SA-CORE-2018-002. Both SA-CORE-2018-002 and this vulnerability are being exploited in the wild.

item.title: CVE-2024-45440|2024-09-12T15:27:33.952572 -- drupal -- drupal%20core
item.description: core/authorize.php in Drupal 11.x-dev allows Full Path Disclosure (even when error logging is None) if the value of hash_salt is file_get_contents of a file that does not exist.
